mapper.select: SELECT SPSA.PLNT_CD , SPSA.PM_SPCM_IDX , SPSA.ACSR_SEQ , SPSA.PITM_VER , SPSA.PITM_CD , SPSA.ENM_DT , SPSA.EXPIR_DT , SPSA.APR_UID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER SU WHERE SU.USER_ID = SPSA.APR_UID) APR_UNM , SPSA.MUFT , SPSA.RMK , SPSA.DEL_YN , QPI.PITM_NM , QPI.PITM_EN , QPI.PITM_TYP , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPI.PITM_TYP) AS PITM_TYP_NM FROM SD_PM_SPCM_ACSR SPSA LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_INFO QPI ON SPSA.PITM_CD = QPI.PITM_CD AND SPSA.PITM_VER = QPI.PITM_VER AND SPSA.PLNT_CD = QPI.PLNT_CD WHERE 1=1 AND SPSA.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND SPSA.PM_SPCM_IDX = #{pmSpcmIdx} AND SPSA.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY SPSA.ACSR_SEQ
